text:
1. Page Title: Raskolnikov's Thirst for Company

2. Panels:

   - Panel 1 — Setup: Raskolnikov in a crowded tavern, weary.
     Dialogue/Thoughts:
       • Raskolnikov: "I crave a moment of escape."
       • Raskolnikov: "This crowd feels oddly inviting."

   
   - Panel 2 — Setup: Tavern master appears, greasy and loud.
     Dialogue/Thoughts:
       • Tavern Master: "What’ll it be, gentlemen?"
       • Raskolnikov: "Just a moment here…"

3. Layout: staggered

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Raskolnikov, weary from isolation, feels a sudden desire for company despite the unpleasantness of his surroundings.
